events.name: Nu Delta BBQ
events.description: Chillin relaxin and acting all cool, come kick off rush at the mansion.

events.name: A Taste of Nu Delta
events.description: We got that good shit. Get to know the brothers and their ethinicites as we bring favorite foods to the house.

events.name: Go Kart Racing
events.description: Mario Kart's got nothing on making someone spin out in real life. Don't miss out.

events.name: Paintball
events.description: We'll shoot you in the face, but not if you get us first. Show us what you're made of.

events.name: MONSTER JAM
events.description: We got the best DJs on campus and this party gunna be SO MUCH FUN. If you know you know...

events.name: Chicken n Waffles
events.description: The name says it all, come through for the best breakfast on campus.

events.name: Basketball
events.description: Ball is life, even if you're not nice. Come shoot your shot.

events.name: Steak & Lobster
events.description: Steak and Lobster done right! If you want the bougie experience with the best flavor - this is the place to be.

events.name: Party Bus
events.description: It's lit, come party hopping with the brothers of Nu Delta.
